import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const RobotDetails = ({ robot }) => { if (!robot) { return
Loading...
; } const { id, name, model, manufacturer, serialNumber, height, mass, status, description } = robot; const Sensor = ({ type, status }) => (

{type}

{status ? 'OK' : 'FAILED'}

); return (

{name}

{model}

Manufacturer

{manufacturer}

Serial Number

{serialNumber}

Height

Mass

); }; export default RobotDetails;
